Net Ball.description: 3.5x if used on a Water- or Bug-type Pokémon, 1x otherwise

Nest Ball.description: The catch rate decreases as the target Pokémon's level increases, from 4x at level 1 to 1x at level 31 and beyond

Repeat Ball.description: Increases for each successive catch (0.1x increase) on a Pokémon up to 2.5x. Resets to 1x on a different Pokémon

Timer Ball.description: (1 + (turn count * 0.30))x maximum 4x at 11 turns, minimum 1.0x on first turn

Luxury Ball.description: 1x Doubles the rate in which the contained Pokémon receives friendship

Dive Ball.description: 3.5x if used on a water-dwelling Pokémon, 1x otherwise

Dusk Ball.description: 2.5x if used in a cave or at night, 1x otherwise

Heal Ball.description: 1.25x Fully restores a caught Pokémon's HP, PP, and status

Quick Ball.description: 5x if used on the first turn of a battle, 1x otherwise

Dream Ball.description: Better catch rate if the Pokémon has been asleep for more turns, max catch rate of 4x, minimum catch rate of 1x

Fast Ball.description: Better catch rate if the Pokémon has a higher base Speed (100+), max catch rate of 4x, minimum catch rate of 1x

Friend Ball.description: Makes the Pokémon very happy upon successful capture. 2.5x if used on Pokémon which evolves due to happiness, 1x otherwise

Heavy Ball.description: Better catch rate if the Pokémon is heavier, max catch rate of 4x, minimum catch rate of 1x

Level Ball.description: 4x if used on Pokémon who are the same level as yours, 1x otherwise

Love Ball.description: 8x if used on Pokémon in the same evolution line as yours and the opposite gender, 1x on genderless foes and otherwise

Lure Ball.description: 4x if used on a Pokémon hooked by a fishing rod, 1x otherwise

Moon Ball.description: 4x if used on Pokémon that evolves using a Moon Stone, 1x otherwise
